snippet: The writer, Emma Gilbey Keller, had focused on the Twitter account and blog of Lisa Bonchek Adams, a mother of three who is being treated for stage four breast cancer.
abstract: British newspaper The Guardian removes from its website a controversial column by writer Emma Gilbey Keller that discussed Twitter account and blog of Lisa Bonchek Adams, mother of three who is being treated for stage four breast cancer; cites an investigation into the column.
lead_paragraph: The writer, Emma Gilbey Keller, had focused on the Twitter account and blog of Lisa Bonchek Adams, a mother of three who is being treated for stage four breast cancer.

headline.main: Guardian Deletes Column About a Cancer Patient
headline.print_headline: Guardian Deletes Column About a Cancer Patient
